strapiPost.title: Fayetteville Public Library Provides Rooms For Personal Study and Private Events
strapiPost.content:
Whether you’re an event planner in need of a venue or a remote worker looking for a change of scenery, Fayetteville Public Library offers affordable event spaces and free study rooms.

Places to Work: Several meeting rooms and over 20 study rooms are available to reserve for up to 4 hours at a time — perfect for a team meeting, tutoring sessions, or just a quiet space to work or study. Room reservations are free for library cardholders.

Places to Play: Event venues for medium to large-scale events are available at reasonable rates, including the Event Center (with a 1,000-person standing room capacity), multiple board rooms, a dance studio, a 16-station kitchen, and a beautiful outdoor courtyard space.

Visit faylib.org/reservations to book a room or faylib.org/rentals for more information about available event spaces.
